body.subject: Deployment.json validated - all requirements met, deployment remains blocked
body.summary: Reviewed deployment.json - all requirements from review.json are included in deployment readiness checklist. Deployment strategy, rollback plans, monitoring setup comply with requirements. Deployment remains BLOCKED until quality veto is resolved (implementation.json, test_evidence, security tests, performance tests).
key_points: Deployment.json fully complies with requirements from review.json

Deployment readiness checklist includes all requirements: code (implementation.json, layer boundaries), tests (coverage >= 80%, security, performance), quality_gates (release_gate: true), infrastructure, observability, rollback
Monitoring setup ready: 6 Prometheus metrics (including god_agent_memory_retrieval_seconds, god_agent_intent_routing_seconds for AC5/AC2), 3 Grafana dashboards, 7 alerts, 2 health checks
Rollback plans defined: per-task, full, partial - all comply with plan.json
Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production) with validation gates at each stage
All dependencies accounted for: shared infra (MongoDB, Prometheus, LLM API, RAG pipeline), internal use cases (no changes)
concerns: Deployment remains BLOCKED until quality veto is resolved
All requirements from review.json are included in deployment readiness checklist, but require code implementation and tests
Monitoring and observability setup ready, but requires GodAgentMetrics implementation for metrics export
Rollback plans defined, but require testing after code implementation
body.action_needed: Await completion of development and re-quality review. After receiving implementation.json and test_evidence from developer, quality engineer will conduct re-review. If all quality gates pass (release_gate: true, coverage >= 80%, security tests pass, performance targets met), deployment can be unblocked. Deployment.json ready for use after quality gates pass.

validation_status.blocker: quality_veto - requires implementation.json, test_evidence, security tests, performance tests
